titleStmt.title: Poems: by Francis Beaumont, Gent. Viz. The hermaphrodite. The remedy of love. Elegies. Sonnets, with other poems.
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D. Metamorphoses. English. Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Laurence Blaiklock, and are to be sold at his shop neare the middle Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: The words "The hermaphrodite. .. poems." are bracketed together on title page.
Includes a reprint of "Salmacis and Hermaphroditus", a translation from Ovid's "Metamorphoses" which may not be by Beaumont. Other poems here are definitely not by Beaumont.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffebr. 10. 1652"; the '3' in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
The hermaphrodite -- The remedy of love -- Elegies -- Sonnets, with other poems
